name: Gliding on Snow
description:
WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

You need energy to move forward (the bar beside).

Avoid obstacles appeared and glide as far as you can.

You can glide onto ramp and fly on the sky to avoid obstacles for a short time.

Be aware of the random blizzard that will lower your vision!

Credits:

Music by OneManSymphony https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDhmSe6HNJgAAfAjNZlrxDg
